title: Community-Requested: Enhanced Replay
description:
Based on community feedback from 1 users:

- Suggestion: Add a replay system and theater mode.

This feature would enhance the player experience while maintaining our F2P-friendly approach.
Engagement metrics suggest high community interest in this area.
comparative_notes: [Age of Origins] social: Implement guild system without pay-to-win territory bonuses. Focus on cosmetic guild customization.
[Age of Origins] customization: Offer cosmetic-only commander skins. Any stat-affecting commanders should be earnable by all.
[Age of Origins] AVOID: VIP system with subscription benefits - not F2P adaptable

title: Community-Requested: Enhanced Social
description:
Based on community feedback from 1 users:

- Can we get a guild/clan system? Would make the game more social without any pay-to-win elements.

This feature would enhance the player experience while maintaining our F2P-friendly approach.
Engagement metrics suggest high community interest in this area.
comparative_notes: [Age of Origins] social: Implement guild system without pay-to-win territory bonuses. Focus on cosmetic guild customization.

title: Community-Requested: Enhanced Customization
description:
Based on community feedback from 1 users:

- Would love to see more character customization options! Maybe different armor styles that don't affect stats?

This feature would enhance the player experience while maintaining our F2P-friendly approach.
Engagement metrics suggest high community interest in this area.
comparative_notes: [Age of Origins] customization: Offer cosmetic-only commander skins. Any stat-affecting commanders should be earnable by all.

title: Community-Requested: Enhanced Profile
description:
Based on community feedback from 1 users:

- Can we get more profile customization? Banners, borders, titles - all cosmetic stuff that shows progression.

This feature would enhance the player experience while maintaining our F2P-friendly approach.
Engagement metrics suggest high community interest in this area.
comparative_notes: [Age of Origins] customization: Offer cosmetic-only commander skins. Any stat-affecting commanders should be earnable by all.
[Age of Origins] progression: Multiple progression paths but equal time investment for all players. No paid speedups.
